title: San Remo Women: Wiebes Outkicks Vos after Kopecky Leadout for Monument Win
content:
Vollering and climbers can't drop sprinters on the Poggio, world champion Kopecky sacrifices her chances in first women's San Remo in 20 years.

Read the full article at San Remo Women: Wiebes Outkicks Vos after Kopecky Leadout for Monument Win on Velo.
author: sstokes
